articles.description: Xiaomi has announced its Redmi Note 10 line, including the Redmi Note 10 Pro, the Note 10S, Note 10, Note 10 5G, and Note 10 Pro Max.The Note 10 Pro’s standout features are its 120Hz OLED display and 108-megapixel camera.
articles.content:
120Hz + 108MP = about $260
Xiaomi has announced its Redmi Note 10 line, the latest in its phone series thats titanically popular in India and beyond. As is tradition for the Redmi Note phones, the 1… [+1457 chars]
